data.title: Order of William C. Dietz Books
data.meta_description: This is the Order of William C. Dietz Books in both chronological order and publication order. List verified daily and newest books added immediately.
data.text:
William C. Dietz is an American science fiction author. He specializes in military science fiction and has also written numerous video game and Star Wars novelizations. He’s the creator and author of the Sam McCade series and the Legion of the Damned series.

William grew up near Seattle, Washington where he also attended college at the University of Washington. After college and serving in the Navy, Dietz worked as a surgical technician, college instructor, news writer, television producer and director of public relations and marketing for an international telephone company before settling on writing. He published his first book in 1984, but did not become a full time novelist until 2002.

If You Like William C. Dietz Books, You’ll Love…

John Ringo

David Weber

David Drake

Galactic Bounty is the first book in the Sam McCade series. This book introduces us to McCade. In this world, there are no police and the government uses elite bounty hunters to do the police work. Sam McCade is one of the best, if not the best. McCade is on the chase of a traitorous navy captain. McCade is the only one who can stop him and if he doesn’t, an alien threat is promising the destruction of the Terran Empire.

The first book in The Legion of the Damned series is Andromeda’s Fall. This book is set years in the future when space travel, advanced medicine and technology are the norm. The more our world changes, the more it stays the same. Cat is a lady of power who lives only for joy. The next party is her main worry until her brother is murdered by an Empress. She soon finds herself among the society’s misfits, the Legion, and suddenly she has something besides the next part to think of: revenge on Empress Ophelia for what she did to her brother.
